message.body: Billy put me in charge of letting then know if roads get too bad to pull the drivers off the roads
Nows a good time lmao
Lmao right. .. but its only slush near the store. It was straight ice on ninth st
Yea its all ice here in the lot. I dont even want to leave.
When I went to my moms I slid more than half a block doing 7 mph bec it was a sheet of ice down the whole block
But im just taking my time and a few orders at once so im not forced to hurry
Btw drivers can't wear sweat pants anymore. Makes no sense
Wow!
Yup. Like wtf.
That sucks.
But so far 144 149
Cool.. i hope you do really well
Well 70 pins handicap. So 214 219
Ok cool
So a total of 660 for the 3. Lets hope its enough to make the cut.
Yea I know. . Good luck! !!!
I made the cut! Just gotta win 1 more game for money
That's awesome!
Just delivered on 100 block of monroe. The end of the block is cafe fuy-something where we get nutella hot choc. Was so tempted to run in there lol
Lost by 10 pins. No money
Aw bummer.. sorry
Its fine. Had fun. I #### the bed. Didnt even bowl average.
That's good (had fun)... #### the bed? Expression? I never heard you say that before
Btw oogies has a leak now lol. I wish we just closed. No customers shoveled nor salted. I annotated busted my ### 3x so far
Ahahaha yes expression. Ahahaha I use it a lot when talking about my bowling abilities.
